Name: PRIMARY
Comments: Carried forward from L2 FITS file

Name: INSTRUMENT_HEADER
Comments: Carried forward from L2 FITS file

Name: RECEIPT
Description: Table of operations that have been performed on this file

Name: DRP_CONFIG
Description: Pipeline details (settings etc) to go from native data to L2

Name: EXT_DESCRIPT
Description: Table describing contents of each extension

Name: ORDER_TABLE
Description: Table capturing the wavelength extent of each order in Trace 1
Comments: Required columns: physical echelle order; index echelle order; start wavelength [64bit]; end wavelength [64bit]

Name: STITCHED_CORR_SCI_FLUX
Description: Order stitched and blaze-corrected flux co-added across all traces
Comments: This flux array stitches together all orders and co-adds all traces and has been blaze corrected

Name: STITCHED_CORR_SCI_WAVE
Description: Order stitched BC- and drift-corrected wavelength solution
Comments: This wavelength solution stitches together all orders and has been both drift and barycentric corrected

Name: STITCHED_CORR_SCI_VAR
Description: Order stitched variance for the combined flux in STITCHED_CORR_SCI_FLUX
Comments: This variance array stitches together all orders and is based on the co-added and blaze corrected flux (STITCHED_CORR_FLUX)

Name: STITCHED_CORR_TRACE1_FLUX
Description: Order stitched blaze-corrected flux in trace 1
Comments: This flux array stitches together all orders and has been blaze corrected. If only one trace then leave empty and only populate the STITCHED_CORR_SCI_FLUX extension

Name: STITCHED_CORR_TRACE1_WAVE
Description: Order stitched BC- and drift-corrected wavelength solution for trace 1
Comments: This wavelength solution stitches together all orders and has been both drift and barycentric corrected.  If only one trace then leave empty and only populate the STITCHED_CORR_SCI_WAVE extension

Name: STITCHED_CORR_TRACE1_VAR
Description: Order stitched variance for the flux in STITCHED_CORR_TRACE1_FLUX
Comments: This variance array stitches together all orders and is based on the blaze corrected flux (STITCHED_CORR_TRACE1_FLUX).  If only one trace then leave empty and only populate the STITCHED_CORR_SCI_VAR extension

Name: STITCHED_CUSTOMCORR1_SCI_FLUX
Comments: This could include additional corrections such as telluric or sky corrections

Name: STITCHED_CUSTOMCORR1_SCI_WAVE
Comments: Wavelength solution corresponding to the flux array in STITCHED_CUSTOMCORR1_SCI_FLUX

Name: STITCHED_CUSTOMCORR1_SCI_VAR
Comments: Variance of the STITCHED_CUSTOMCORR1_SCI_FLUX flux array

Name: STITCHED_CUSTOMCORR1_TRACE1_FLUX
Comments: This could include additional corrections such as telluric or sky corrections

Name: STITCHED_CUSTOMCORR1_TRACE1_WAVE
Comments: Wavelength solution corresponding to the flux array in STITCHED_CUSTOMCORR1_TRACE1_FLUX

Name: STITCHED_CUSTOMCORR1_TRACE1_VAR
Comments: Variance of the STITCHED_CUSTOMCORR1_TRACE1_FLUX flux array
